translated: Throughout all my lives in saṃsāra,

translated: Until I attain acceptance of the Dharma,

original: ngan song gsum du nam yang mi skye zhing //
analyzed: ngan song gsum du nam yang mi skye zhing //
translated: May I never be born in the three lower realms,🔽But in the higher realms, with a human body.

analyzed: mtho ris mi yi lus su skye bar shog / mtho ris mi yi lus su skyes nas kyang //
translated: And having been born in the higher realms, with a human body,🔽May I never be born as a sinful king, a minister,

original: sdig spyod rgyal por ma skye blon po dang // dmag dpon zhal che gcod par bdag ma skye //
analyzed: sdig spyod rgyal por ma skye blon po dang // dmag dpon zhal che gcod par bdag ma skye //
translated: A general, or a judge,🔽Or as a fortune-teller, a sesame-pounder, a brewer, a thief,

translated: A slave, or a slave-woman.🔽May I never be born as a monk, a lay practitioner, a master,🔽An elder, a worker, or a disciplinarian,

original: dge skos gtsang sbyor ba dang dam bzhag pa //
analyzed: dge skos gtsang sbyor ba dang dam bzhag pa //
translated: A monk official, a sweeper, or a proctor.

original: gang zag las byed rnams su bdag ma skye //
analyzed: gang zag las byed rnams su bdag ma skye //
translated: May I never be born as a person who is a laborer.🔽May I never be born in a borderland, in a land of barbarians,🔽as a fool, a mute, a deaf person, a cripple, or an envious person,🔽as a tīrthika, a heretic, a brahmin,

analyzed: mtha' 'khob kla klo'i skye ba'i yul rnams dang // glen lkugs 'on long phrag dog can rnams dang // mu stegs log lta bram ze'i rigs rnams dang // rigs ngan shan pa'i rigs su bdag ma skye // byang chub ma thob par du rtag par bdag / dam chos spyod pa'i lus su skye bar shog / dam chos spyod pa'i lus @318a * //
translated: or a person of a low caste, a butcher.🔽Until I attain enlightenment, may I always be born🔽with a body that practices the holy Dharma.

original: su skyes nas kyang //
analyzed: su skyes nas kyang //
translated: Having been born with a body that practices the holy Dharma,

original: mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: mi dge gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur zhing //
translated: may I not come under the influence of nonvirtue.🔽May I not be interrupted by illness during my life,🔽and may I encounter the Dharma as soon as I am born.

original: tshe la nad kyis bar chad med pa dang // skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog / skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad nas kyang //
analyzed: tshe la nad kyis bar chad med pa dang // skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad par shog / skyes ma thag tu chos dang phrad nas kyang //
translated: Having encountered the Dharma as soon as I am born,

original: mnyan bsam bsgom pas rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs nas //
analyzed: mnyan bsam bsgom pas rig pa'i rgyud sbyangs nas //
translated: may I purify my continuum of consciousness through listening, reflection, and meditation.

original: ting 'dzin rtse gcig sems la dbang thob ste //
analyzed: ting 'dzin rtse gcig sems la dbang thob ste //
translated: Having attained mastery of one-pointed concentration,

original: rnam shes drug po yul la g-yengs ma gyur //
analyzed: rnam shes drug po yul la g-yengs ma gyur //
translated: may the six consciousnesses not be distracted by objects.

original: lus kyi yan lag rgyas shing skyon med de //
analyzed: lus kyi yan lag rgyas shing skyon med de //
translated: Their bodies are well-proportioned and free from defects,

original: dbang po ma nyams rigs mtho bskur ba'i gnas //
analyzed: dbang po ma nyams rigs mtho bskur ba'i gnas //
translated: Their faculties are unimpaired, and they are born into a high caste.🔽They perfect all the qualities of the Buddha,🔽Go forth as young men, and maintain pure conduct.

original: sangs rgyas chos kun rdzogs par byed pa dang // gzhon nur rab byung tshul khrims ldan pa dang // dge bshes mchog rnams rtag tu bsten byed cing //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chos kun rdzogs par byed pa dang // gzhon nur rab byung tshul khrims ldan pa dang // dge bshes mchog rnams rtag tu bsten byed cing //
translated: They always rely on the best of spiritual friends

original: sa bcu rim gyis bgrod rnams thogs med de //
analyzed: sa bcu rim gyis bgrod rnams thogs med de //
translated: And traverse the ten grounds without impediment.🔽May they swiftly attain unsurpassed awakening.

original: bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog / bla med byang chub myur du thob nas kyang //
analyzed: bla med byang chub myur du thob par shog / bla med byang chub myur du thob nas kyang //
translated: And once they have swiftly attained unsurpassed awakening,

original: rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la //
analyzed: rgyud drug 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad la //
translated: May they benefit beings of the six realms🔽Through the four means of gathering disciples.

original: bsdu pa rnam bzhis 'gro don byed par shog / slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
analyzed: bsdu pa rnam bzhis 'gro don byed par shog / slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa'i smon lam zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
